about_the_game:
A tough as nails rogue-like. Level up, pick skills, and modify your weapons. Survive KOLOTUN. Good luck.

SURVIVE KOLOTUN

The worlds heat is running out. Our attempts to stop it have only made it worse. A new ice-age is imminent, this event is known as KOLOTUN.

FIGHT, SURVIVE

The world grows colder. Militant groups, Crumbling Governments, Guerilla Factions, and others attempt to seize control. 

Survive the cold.

Use your weapons and skills to out match your assailant.

UPGRAGE

Every encounter you will learn from. Learn new skills to make defending yourself easier.

Find attachments to make your weapons more powerful.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: KOLOTUN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
